values.description: Order properties enable you to customize how the brokerage executes your orders. DefaultOrderProperties sets the default properties for your orders.
values.keywords: Order properties, brokerage order execution settings, DefaultOrderProperties, time in force, how long an order should remain open if it doesn't fill, fill orders during pre-market and post-market trading hours, only add liquidity to a market, make an order not show on the order book, the order must only decrease your position size, set an order tag
